title: What Is “Something”?
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>I kind of want to do something different for our next live.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Something different, you say? But well, if we start changing things now, it would take too much time....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari agrees with Kanan. Besides, wouldn’t it be more interesting to have “something” that would surprise our fans?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Well, that might be true, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>With that said, Mari has an idea! How about we fly some hot-air balloons and use them for our live? Doesn’t that sound fun?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Hot-air balloons!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hot-air balloons!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That’s right! We’ll ride on the balloons to the sky and perform from there! Ah, our fans would also ride on them, and we’ll all have a live in the sky. Interesting, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, as expected of Mari! The scale of your “something” is really big, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s too dangerous! Plus, there’s no way we could prepare that many hot-air balloons....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s fine! Leave it to me♪ Mari will go get us some balloons now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eh, Mari, you’re being serious!? W-, wait, hold on-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
